hero.badge: Next-Generation Meeting Minutes Tool Powered by AI

subtitle.line1: From real-time transcription to summarization and task extraction.
subtitle.line2: With AI Minutes, you're freed from tedious minute-taking,
subtitle.line3: allowing you to focus on meaningful discussions and creative activities.

features.title: Everything you need, all in one place.
features.description: AI Minutes provides all the features you need to streamline your meetings. With a simple and intuitive interface, anyone can master it instantly.

transcription.title: Real-time Transcription
transcription.description: Our highly accurate speech recognition engine converts meeting discussions into text in real-time, preventing you from missing anything.

summary.title: Smart Summarization
summary.description: AI instantly summarizes even lengthy meetings, allowing you to grasp only the key points in a short time.

tasks.title: Automatic Task Extraction
tasks.description: Automatically detects 'to-dos' from conversations and lists them as action items.

title.line1: Want to maximize your team's productivity

description.line1: Implement AI Minutes now and transform the way you meet.
description.line2: Experience its effectiveness with a 14-day free trial.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue to AI Minutes

dashboard.title: Overview
dashboard.description: Manage and view your meeting minutes

minuts.title: Upload Video or Audio
minuts.description: AI will automatically create meeting minutes. Support for MP4 or MP3 files.
